text: We woke up this morning to a blanket of white.

The clouds were hanging low and there was
snow on the ground.

It is our first snowfall of the season, so
it is pretty exciting.

We've been traveling in really warm places
for the last two and a half years, so we haven't

experienced a proper winter and now that we're
back in Canada we're going to relish every

Are you going to throw a snowball with a stick
at me?

Well, we've been outside for maybe ten minutes
and I think that is all we can handle now,

so I'm going to run back indoors and have
some hot chocolate.
